description:
Yoga Rave music band. 14 th June ! Coming from Argentina to Aachen!

Join in for the rave party without alccool and uplifting Yoga in sattvic atmosphere

YOGARAVE EUROPEAN TOUR:

12 th of june Stockholm
14 th of june Achen
29 th of june St Petersburg

and more to come - let´s rave Europe with positive, healthy energy:)


juste a look:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9MwpV8gmf-w&feature=share

 

 

Yoga Rave Show is in the news for aachen KLENKES ticket central . You can collect ur ticket their too .
http://www.klenkes.de/KlenkesTicket/news/49881.yoga-rave-in-aachen.html

https://www.facebook.com/yogarave.aachen
name: Yoga rave in Aachen ( 150 km from brussels)!

description: Come join us this Friday for an evening of chanting and joy. This gathering is actually called Satsang, being in the company of the truth. The Sanskrit language creates more than 52 different vibrations in the body, appeasing our nervous system and bring a sense of connection with our inner Self. You don't need to be a perfect singer, its just an opportunity to learn and chant as a group. See you soon !
name: Mantra chanting
